title: Inquis AI
description: A unified AI assistant and content management system that significantly improved student engagement and learning efficiency by 21% through an integrated front-end and scalable back-end built with Flask and Firebase.

title: Automated Industrial Inspection System using Computer Vision
description: A system to inspect manufactured parts and enhance quality control by using computer vision techniques. This system aims to boost inspection accuracy and efficiency, thus reducing costs and human error.

title: Image Captioning Benchmarking using Encoder/Decoder Deep Learning Models
description: This project evaluates the performance of encoder-decoder deep neural networks for image captioning using pre-trained ResNeXt CNN as the encoder, and both GRU & LSTM architectures as decoders. The models are compared using BLEU, METEOR, and ROUGE scores

title: Safeguarding NYC: Analyzing Crime Patterns using Big Data
description: Projected a 30% enhancement in NYPD's crime prevention efficiency through big data analysis of 220k+ crime records using advanced ELT pipelines and Spark.

title: Aqua Analytica: Water Demand Forecast Analytics
description: A Water Consumption Analytics System for Bengaluru using advanced ML techniques such as ARIMA, SARIMA & Holt-Winters for forecasting.

title: Autonomous Robot Navigation using RL
description: Trained a Turtlebot3 Waffle Pi to autonomously navigate through the manufacturing plant without collision using DQN algorithm and human intervention data for faster learning.

title: Customer Risk Assessment, Analysis and Management
description: Developed a system that identifies high value customers based on CLV who at risk of churning and flags them so that they can be incentivised for retention.
